meanings.definition: To unite or join together before a certain time or event.
meanings.sent1: The team preunited before the big game to discuss their strategy.
meanings.sent2: They always preunited before making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The ants preunited to carry the heavy leaf together.
meanings.sent4: The students preunited their efforts to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent5: The birds preunited in flight, moving as one graceful formation.

meanings.definition: Having been united or joined together before a certain time or event.
meanings.sent1: The preunited group arrived at the party together.
meanings.sent2: The preunited family had a strong bond that lasted for generations.
meanings.sent3: The preunited puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: The preunited countries formed a powerful alliance.
meanings.sent5: The preunited stars shone brightly in the night sky.
